block.p: Claudia Maria Taylor, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Everard Sinclair Taylor of Vienna, Va., was married yesterday to Gunnar S. Overstrom III, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Overstrom Jr. of West Hartford, Conn. The Rev. Susannah R. Smith performed the ceremony at the Episcopal Church of St. James in New York.
Mrs. Overstrom is the director for business development at Style.com, the Web site for Vogue and W magazines in New York. She graduated from Yale University and received a law degree from Georgetown.

Claudia Maria Taylor, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Everard Sinclair Taylor of Vienna, Va., was married yesterday to Gunnar S. Overstrom III, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Overstrom Jr. of West Hartford, Conn. The Rev. Susannah R. Smith performed the ceremony at the Episcopal Church of St. James in New York.
Mrs. Overstrom is the director for business development at Style.com, the Web site for Vogue and W magazines in New York. She graduated from Yale University and received a law degree from Georgetown.

Her father, who retired from the Foreign Service and was the administrative consul at the United States Consulate in Rio de Janeiro, now owns the Vienna branch of the Money Concepts Financial Planning Center.

Mr. Overstrom is a vice president and an investment banker at Morgan Stanley Dean Witter in New York. He graduated from Hobart College and received an M.B.A. from Cornell University. His father, a former president of the Shawmut National Corporation, which was a banking company in Hartford and Boston, is now a partner in Shawmut Capital Partners, a venture capital firm in Boston.
